plays.text: Goal scored by Jeremy Stevenson assisted by Greg Johnson AND Scottie Upshall
Penalty to Mattias Norstrom 2 minutes for Hooking(opposing player not identified)
Goal scored by Martin Erat assisted by Darcy Hordichuk AND Scott Nichol
Penalty to Marek Zidlicky 2 minutes for Interference Craig Conroy
Penalty to Martin Erat 2 minutes for Holding the Stick Joe Corvo
Penalty to Scott Hartnell 2 minutes for Crosschecking Craig Conroy
Penalty to Sean Avery 10 minutes for Game Misconduct(opposing player not identified)
Penalty to Sean Avery 5 minutes for Checking from Behind Simon Gamache served by George Parros
Penalty to Scottie Upshall 2 minutes for Hooking Jeremy Roenick
Penalty to Martin Erat 2 minutes for Hooking Michael Cammalleri
Penalty to Dustin Brown 2 minutes for Interference Kimmo Timonen
Penalty to George Parros 2 minutes for Interference Jeremy Stevenson
Goal scored by Craig Conroy assisted by Pavol Demitra
Penalty to David Legwand 2 minutes for Hooking Eric Belanger
Penalty to Danny Markov 2 minutes for High Sticking Craig Conroy
Penalty to Ryan Suter 2 minutes for Interference Tim Gleason
Goal scored by Tom Kostopoulos assisted by Nathan Dempsey AND Jeremy Roenick
Penalty to Lubomir Visnovsky 2 minutes for Hooking Paul Kariya
